original_text: And it shall come to pass in the last days, that the mountain of the Lord's house shall be established in the top of the mountains, and shall be exalted above the hills; and all nations shall flow unto it.
korean_text: 말일에 여호와의 전의 산이 모든 산 꼭대기에 굳게 설 것이요 모든 작은 산 위에 뛰어나리니 만방이 그리로 모여들 것이라

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
that the mountain of the Lord's house
shall be established in the top of the mountains
and shall be exalted above the hills
and all nations shall flow unto it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 민족이 그곳으로 흘러갈 것이라
